wikipedia_page.main: Paul Adam Belk (born 12 June 1977) is a British former competitive swimmer who swam in the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia.  Belk competed for the British men's team in the preliminary heats of the 4x100-metre freestyle relay.Immediately prior to the 2000 Olympics, Belk swam in the 2000 FINA Short Course World Championships in Athens, winning a bronze medal in the 4x100-metre freestyle relay.  The following year as the 2001 World University Games in Beijing, he was a member of the first-place British team in the men's 4x100-metre freestyle relay.

response: Stevens competed only in the men's 4×100 m freestyle relay at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney. Teaming with Paul Belk, Anthony Howard, and Jamaican-based Sion Brinn in heat three, Stevens swam the anchor leg and recorded a split of 50.16, but the Brits missed a chance to reach the top 8 final by 0.35 seconds, finishing in third place and ninth overall from the morning prelims with a time of 3:20.45.
